features: 【More Safety】Upgraded - the magnets covered by stainless steel will enhance the magnetism and extend the use-life. The magnetic building tiles toys for toddlers 3-4 are made of premium quality ABS plastic. Round smooth edges will protect kid's hands.

【STEM Sensory Toys】Colorful design is good to develop kid's color and shape recognition. This STEM Educational toys for 3+ 4 5 6 7 8 year old boys girls can build from simple 2D patterns to complex 3D geometric shapes. More pieces for endless possibilities.

【Beginner Kit For Kids】This magnetic tiles beginner set include 30+6 pieces (18 pieces squares, 12 pieces triangles, 6 blank blocks with cute animals stickers), an idea booklet and a storage bag. The standard size is compatible with major brands in markets.

【Learning while playing】The educational toys for 3+ year old are perfect for classroom, family, kindergarten, day care centers etc. This creative building block toys not only help reduce the time children spend playing with electronics but also exercising their practical, imaginative and creative skills.

【Perfect Educational Toys Gifts】Magnetic tiles as STEM toys are popular for kids ages 3-5. A perfect gift for birthday, Christmas, Children's day, Easter or any other occasions. Perfect educational toys for kids ages 4-8.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ah...the beauty of magnetic tiles.
reviews.reviewText: Greetings, fellow enthusiasts of the technological wonders that surround us! Today, I bring you tidings of a captivating toy that has captured the hearts and imaginations of my little ones—the Magnetic Tiles!Now, as a connoisseur of all things magnetic and marvelous, I must say that these tiles have certainly earned my stamp of approval. From the moment they arrived at our doorstep, they have been a source of endless entertainment and joy for my three children.The beauty of these magnetic tiles lies in their simplicity yet limitless potential. Their vibrant colors and magnetic properties provide a captivating experience for young minds. The ability to easily connect and create various shapes, structures, and even 3D models is nothing short of magical.I must confess, it warms my heart to see my children engaged in imaginative play for hours on end. They build towering castles, futuristic spaceships, and all manner of fantastical creations. The versatility of these tiles truly knows no bounds, sparking creativity and nurturing their developing minds.Furthermore, let us not forget the durability factor. Despite months of vigorous play and enthusiastic exploration, these magnetic tiles have stood the test of time. Their sturdy construction ensures that they can withstand the whims and fancies of even the most exuberant little ones.As a parent, I appreciate the educational value that these magnetic tiles bring to the table. They promote spatial awareness, problem-solving skills, and hand-eye coordination—all vital foundations for a bright and inquisitive mind.But perhaps the greatest testament to their greatness lies in the fact that my children continue to play with them after three whole months. That, my friends, is the mark of a truly exceptional toy. The Magnetic Tiles have cemented their place as a beloved and enduring companion for my little ones.In conclusion, dear friends, if you are in search of a toy that combines fun, creativity, and educational value, look no further than these mesmerizing Magnetic Tiles. Let your children's imaginations soar as they explore the fascinating world of magnetism and construction.Embrace the joy of play, my fellow tech enthusiasts, and witness the marvels that unfold when imagination meets magnetic magic!
